info.author: Stéphane Brunner
info.description:
A sample and productive personal documents library

* Scan your documents
  * Auto rotate
  * index them on the file name and on the content (OCR)

* Mange your pdf
  * index them on the file name and on the content

* Search in your library

`Sources <https://github.com/sbrunner/personal-documents-library/>`_
info.keywords: simple productive personal documents library scan index search
info.name: epaper
info.summary: A simple and productive personal documents library
